Description: Gold finger-ring, stirrup-shaped hoop, oval bezel inscribed with a cartouche containing the nomen of Amenhotep III.
Curator's comments: Published: Gold and Civilisation, Catalogue (Australia 2001): p.117
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (2665)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 13 Mar-24 Jun, Australia, Canberra, National Museum of Australia, Gold and Civilisation 2001 19 Jul-21 Oct, Australia, Melbourne, Museum Victoria, Gold and Civilisation 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
